label: ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-010
title: LiNiO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
\href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-001}{CrNaS$_{2}$ ($F5_{1}$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-004}{CuFeO$_{2}$}, \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-009}{NaFeO$_{2}$}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-010}{LiNiO$_{2}$} all have the same AFLOW label, ABC2\_hR4\_166\_a\_b\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
